name: UIAlertController
desc: An object that displays an alert message to the user.

items.name: message
items.desc: Descriptive text that provides more details about the reason for the alert.

items.name: preferredStyle
items.desc: The style of the alert controller.

items.name: addAction
items.desc: Attaches an action object to the alert or action sheet.

items.name: actions
items.desc: The actions that the user can take in response to the alert or action sheet.

items.name: preferredAction
items.desc: The preferred action for the user to take from an alert.

items.name: textFields
items.desc: The array of text fields displayed by the alert.

items.name: UIAlertController.Style
items.desc: Constants indicating the type of alert to display.

items.name: s UIAlertAction
items.desc: An action that can be taken when the user taps a button in an alert.
